pullRequest.title: docs - remove deprecated-in-v5 config props and vars
pullRequest.bodyText:
doc updates for the deprecated-in-v5, removed-in-v6 features/properties:

remove some notes about the properties
removed old hadoop profile names
call out with step in 5->6 upgrade guide

related: update the default value description of pxf.service.user.impersonation
doc review site link for mods upgrade - scroll down to step 7:http://docs-lisa-pxf6-review.cfapps.io/pxf/6-0/using/upgrade_5_to_6.html#pxfup

commit.message: docs - remove deprecated-in-v5 config props and vars

nodes.bodyText: product question: should we rename these as hive, hive:orc, hive:rc with vectorized being a user option ? @frankgh ?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -103,21 +103,21 @@ The PXF Hadoop connectors provide built-in profiles to support the following dat
 
 The PXF Hadoop connectors expose the following profiles to read, and in many cases write, these supported data formats:
 
-| Data Source | Data Format | Profile Name(s) | Deprecated Profile Name |
-|-----|------|---------|------------|
-| HDFS | delimited single line [text](hdfs_text.html#profile_text) | hdfs:text | HdfsTextSimple |
-| HDFS | delimited [text with quoted linefeeds](hdfs_text.html#profile_textmulti) | hdfs:text:multi | HdfsTextMulti |
-| HDFS | [Avro](hdfs_avro.html) | hdfs:avro | Avro |
-| HDFS | [JSON](hdfs_json.html) | hdfs:json | Json |
-| HDFS | [Parquet](hdfs_parquet.html) | hdfs:parquet | Parquet |
-| HDFS | AvroSequenceFile | hdfs:AvroSequenceFile | n/a |
-| HDFS | [SequenceFile](hdfs_seqfile.html) | hdfs:SequenceFile | SequenceWritable |
-| [Hive](hive_pxf.html) | stored as TextFile | Hive, [HiveText](hive_pxf.html#hive_text) | n/a |
-| [Hive](hive_pxf.html) | stored as SequenceFile | Hive | n/a |
-| [Hive](hive_pxf.html) | stored as RCFile | Hive, [HiveRC](hive_pxf.html#hive_hiverc) | n/a |
-| [Hive](hive_pxf.html) | stored as ORC | Hive, [HiveORC](hive_pxf.html#hive_orc), HiveVectorizedORC | n/a |
-| [Hive](hive_pxf.html) | stored as Parquet | Hive | n/a |
-| [HBase](hbase_pxf.html) | Any | HBase | n/a |
+| Data Source | Data Format | Profile Name(s) |
+|-------------|------|---------|
+| HDFS | delimited single line [text](hdfs_text.html#profile_text) | hdfs:text |
+| HDFS | delimited [text with quoted linefeeds](hdfs_text.html#profile_textmulti) |
+| HDFS | [Avro](hdfs_avro.html) | hdfs:avro |
+| HDFS | [JSON](hdfs_json.html) | hdfs:json |
+| HDFS | [Parquet](hdfs_parquet.html) | hdfs:parquet |
+| HDFS | AvroSequenceFile | hdfs:AvroSequenceFile |
+| HDFS | [SequenceFile](hdfs_seqfile.html) | hdfs:SequenceFile |
+| [Hive](hive_pxf.html) | stored as TextFile | Hive, [HiveText](hive_pxf.html#hive_text) |
+| [Hive](hive_pxf.html) | stored as SequenceFile | Hive |
+| [Hive](hive_pxf.html) | stored as RCFile | Hive, [HiveRC](hive_pxf.html#hive_hiverc) |
+| [Hive](hive_pxf.html) | stored as ORC | Hive, [HiveORC](hive_pxf.html#hive_orc), HiveVectorizedORC |

nodes.bodyText:
are -> were
?  Maybe, to work for later releases.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -106,7 +106,16 @@ After you install the new version of PXF, perform the following procedure:
 
 1. **If you are upgrading to PXF version 6.0**:
 
-    1. step 1
+    1. Ensure that you no longer reference previously deprecated features that are removed in PXF 6.0:

nodes.bodyText: Not sure why the all-caps property names aren't in code format here.  But if that's the convention used throughout it's fine.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -106,7 +106,16 @@ After you install the new version of PXF, perform the following procedure:
 
 1. **If you are upgrading to PXF version 6.0**:
 
-    1. step 1
+    1. Ensure that you no longer reference previously deprecated features that are removed in PXF 6.0:
+
+        | Deprecated Feature | Use Instead |
+        | -------------------|-------------|
+        | Hadoop profile names | hdfs:\<profile> as noted [here](access_hdfs.html#hadoop_connectors) |
+        | `jdbc.user.impersonation` property | `pxf.service.user.impersonation` property in the [jdbc‑site.xml](jdbc_cfg.html#jdbcimpers) server configuration file |
+        | PXF_KEYTAB configuration property | `pxf.service.kerberos.keytab` property in the [pxf‑site.xml](cfg_server.html#pxf-site) server configuration file |

commit.message: use code font for props, are->were
